dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4311 IH: To amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to include American Samoa in the employment services provided under that Act, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Faleomavaega introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to include American Samoa in the employment services provided under that Act, and for other purposes.

section.header: Inclusion of American Samoa in the Wagner-Peyser Act

paragraph.text: in section 2(5) (29 U.S.C. 49a(5)), by inserting American Samoa, after Guam,;
in section 5(b)(1) (29 U.S.C. 49d(b)(1)), by inserting and American Samoa after Guam; and

subparagraph.text: by striking allot to Guam and inserting “allot to—
by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: American Samoa an amount which, in relation to the total amount available for the fiscal year, is equal to the allotment percentage that Guam received of amounts available under this Act in fiscal year 1983
